Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Both the worlds, this and the next, are (not) equal to or match the price (weight) of just one hair of my friend-mentor, Guru Gobind Singh Ji. (2) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਦੀਨ ਅਤੇ ਦੁਨੀਆ ਸਾਡੇ ਉਸ ਪਰੀ-ਚਿਹਰਾ ਦੋਸਤ ਦੀ ਫਾਹੀ ਵਿਚ ਹਨ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr do Awlm kImiq X¤k qwir mUie Xwir mw [1[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I don't have the strength to bear the intensity of even one of his skewed looks,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਦੋਵੇਣ ਜਹਾਨ ਸਾਡੇ ਯਾਰ ਦੇ ਇਕ ਵਾਲ ਦੇ ਮੁਲ ਬਰਾਬਰ ਹਨ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mw nmI Awrym qwib Zmzwie imzgwin aU [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
Just one of his (blessed) looks, that prolongs life instantly, is enough for me." (2) (2)
Sometimes, he acts like a mystic, sometimes like a meditator, and other times like a carefree recluse;
He is our pilot steering our way; he operates in numerous different postures. (2) (3)
Who other than his true devotee-lover can evaluate his pearl-like lips?
The value of this gem is only appreciated by a diamond-rearing-vision. (2) (4)
During every moment of Goyaa's life, my alert heart and soul are relishing
the memory of intoxication of his Narcissus-like-imbued eyes. (2) (5)
O bartender! Kindly spare a heart-warming-shot out of your enjoyable intoxication for me also,
so that with my eyes of recognizing the God-sent prophet, I can solve all my riddles. (3) (1)
When moving towards the destination, my Beloved, I am ever in blissful elation."

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਸੀਣ ਉਸ ਸੱਜਨ ਦੀ ਇਕ ਭੀ ਟੇਢੀ ਨਜ਼ਰ ਦੀ ਤਾਬ ਨਹੀਣ ਝਲ ਸਕਦੇ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: X¤k ingwih jwN-iPzwieS bs bvd drkwir mw [2[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The bell in the neck of a female camel is peeling for nothing. It cannot stop me from proceeding to my goal. (3) (2)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਸਦੀ ਇੱਕੋ ਨਿਗਾਹ ਜਿਹੜੀ ਉਮਰਾਣ ਵਧਾ ਦਿੰਦੀ ਹੈ, ਸਾਨੂੰ ਬਥੇਰੀ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: gwhy sUPI gwhy zwihd gih klMdr mI Svd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The Akaalpurakh is Omnipresent. Our strive to seek his glimpses should be spontaneous

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਦੀ ਤਾਣ ਉਹ ਸੂਫੀ ਬਣ ਜਾਣਦਾ ਹੈ, ਕਦੀ ਭਜਨ ਬੰਦਗੀ ਵਾਲਾ ਅਤੇ ਕਦੀ ਮਸਤ ਕਲੰਦਰ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: rMghwie mu^qilP dwrd buiq AXwr mw [3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Without any obstacle of the whirlpool, the torrent or the bank of the river. (3) (3)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਾਡਾ ਚਾਲਕ ਪਿਆਰਾ ਨਾਨਾ ਰੰਗਾਣ ਦਾ ਮਾਲਕ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: kdir lwAil aU bjuz AwiSk nwN dwnd hIc ks [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Why are we wandering (aimlessly) in jungles and wildernesses,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਸ ਦੇ ਲਾਲਾਣ ਵਰਗੇ ਹੋਠਾਣ ਦੀ ਭਲਾ ਕਦਰ ਬਿਨਾਣ ਪ੍ਰੇਮੀ ਦੇ ਕੌਣ ਜਾਣੇ#

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: kImiq XwkUq dwnd cSim gOhr bwir mw [4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: When He, The Master of Beauty, has made his abode in our own eyes? (3) (4)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਯਾਕੂਤ ਦੀ ਕੀਮਤ ਸਾਡੀ ਮੋਤੀ ਵਸਾਉਣ ਵਾਲੀ ਅੱਖ ਹੀ ਜਾਣਦੀ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr nPs goXw b-Xwd nrgis m^mUir aU [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: When I look around without the Akaalpurakh, I see only a big void;

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਰ ਛਿਨ ਤੇ ਹਰ ਪਲ ਗੋਯਾ ਸਾਡਾ ਹੁਸ਼ਿਆਰ ਦਿਲ

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: bwdwhwie SOk mI-noSd idil huiSAwir mw [5[2[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
Then Goyaa, you tell me, with whom can I entrust this world and my family and household affairs?" (3) (5)
O bartender! Please fill up my glass with a colored alcohol, cup of love,
Because ruby-colored alcohol will give me clues towards my Master. (4) (1)
If the long-necked decanter, like the word, 'Analhaqq', coming out of Mansoor's lips, were to create the ripple sound,
Then, who will endure the strength of such a wee-hour alcohol? And where would there be a brain-cup (to receive such a powerful drink)? (4) (2)
There is darkness in the world. O beloved! Enhance your beauty by increased burnishing, and your moon-face be a candle to the way-farer.
And make your face conspicuously identifiable, because there is a need of a light (lamp) in this world. (4) (3)
The whole life becomes worth living if we can grab a moment (ecstacy) in our Master's remembrance,
Provided, one happens to have such a trice of eagerness, keenness and zest for Akaalpurakh's love. (4) (4)
Goyaa says, "Both of my eyes are like a long and large stream,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਸ ਪਿਆਰੇ ਦੀ ਮਸਤ ਨਰਗਸੀ ਅੱਖ ਦੀ ਯਾਦ ਵਿਚ ਪਿਆਰ ਦਾ ਨਸ਼ਾ ਪੀਣਦਾ ਹੈ ।
